story: You are at home when you hear the news that Selena Kyle has been kidnapped by the Riddler. You must save her
nav: Press 1 to go to blackgate penintentiary, press 2 to go to arkham asylum

story: You search for clues at Blackgate, you get info from Deathstroke that the Riddler is getting help from Bane
nav: Press 1 to go to Santa Prisca, press 2 to go to Nanda Parbat

story: You search for clues at Arkham, you get info from the Joker that the Riddler is getting help from Mr Freeze
nav: Press 1 to go to the iceberg lounge, press 2 to go to the burial ground

story: You come face to face with the Riddler but he escapes and leaves a clue that he kept Selina at Ace chemicals
nav: Press 1 to go to Ace chemicals

story: You seek assistance from the Ra's Al Ghul to stop the Joker. He says he cannot help you
nav: Press 1 to go to Ace chemicals, press 2 to go to Bludhaven

story: You encounter the Riddler's henchmen and a fight ensues. As a result, a bystander gets shot. The police are trying to catch you.
nav: Press 1 to try and escape, press 2 to take the injure person to the hospital

story: You meet Mr freeze and try to have an agreement. Do you help Mr Freeze's wife or go to find the Riddler??
nav: Press 1 to go to the hospital to help as Bruce Wayne, press 2 to go get the Riddler.

story: You try and check out if Selina is being kept at Ace chemicals and find out it is a trap. Do you try to save people or save yourself only?
nav: Press 1 to save people, press 2 to just save yourself

story: You go to Bludhaven to seek Night wing's help. Only to find him missing with an injured person in his apartment. Police think you did it
nav: Press  1 to try and escape, press 2 to abandon everything

story: After a lot of damage, you escape from the police and head to the hospital
nav: Press 1 to go to the hospital.

story: You arrive at the hospital and give the lady the assistance she needs. You are called by the Riddler to meet or risk losing more lives
nav: Press 1 to go to Crime alley for the meeting

story: You end up getting injured extensively in the bomb blast. Alfred decides to take you to the Lazarus pit to heal but it might make you lose your mind. What do you do??
nav: Press 1 to use the pit, press 2 to object to it and save your sanity

story: You end up back in Gotham and try to do some work as Bruce wayne. You receive a tip that the police hq will be bombed by the Riddler.
nav: Press 1 to go to police hq immediately, press to go to batcave and change

story: The bomb is about to go off, Do you save Selina alone or you try to save everyone
nav: Press 1 to save yourselves, press 2 to save people
Press 1 to take Seline to the hospital, press 2 to try to save the cops

story: You come face to face with the Riddler but the police are trying to catch both of you. You will need to harm the police to stop the Riddler.
nav: Press 1 to find another way, press 2 to do whatever it takes

story: The Riddler escapes but injures people in the process, you have a lady in pain. Do you help her or stop the Riddler
nav: Press 1 to help her, press 2 to stop the riddler

story: You are led to the alley where your parents were killed by the Riddler with bombs everywhere. It has reached a boiling point, your life or his???
nav: Press 1 to do kill the Riddler, press 2 to try to save everyone

story: You saved Selina and the city. You are the Arkham Knight!
You could not save Selina and yourself. You failed.
